name: Homaysa
description:
Homaysa is a VR Game/Simulation/Metaverse application that allows users to play, chat & relax, with networked physics making it a suitable place for gaming and simulations all in a multiplayer environment.

Features:

  • VR Multiplayer Gaming
  • VR Chat & Relax
  • No Ads
  • No selling of private data
  • No NFTs
  • No Cryptocurrency

The current version of Homaysa has only the following features/levels:

In Gaming Land:
  • Sword Arena: where users can fight each other with a sword a in multiplayer environment

In Chat & Relax Land:
  • Desert at night
  • Space
  • Earth from space
